Description: Reach new people and re-engage ones you know on Facebook Messenger.
Name: Facebook Messenger

Methods.Name: Message Received
Methods.Description: This callback will occur when a message has been sent to your Page.

Methods.Name: Get Conversation
Methods.Description: Get a conversation between a Facebook page and a user.

Methods.Name: List Conversations
Methods.Description: Return all conversations between a Facebook page and users.

Methods.Name: List Updated Conversations
Methods.Description: Return all conversations updated since the last successful cycle run datetime.

Methods.Name: List Conversations in Folder
Methods.Description: Return all conversations between a Facebook page and users in a specific folder.

Methods.Name: Get Conversation Messages
Methods.Description: Get messages in a conversation between a Facebook page and a user.

Methods.Name: List Done Conversations
Methods.Description: Return all conversations between a Facebook page and users that have been marked as Done.

Methods.Name: List Page Tokens
Methods.Description: Get all available page tokens for the authenticated user.
